name: Back Forward
description:
"Was this always there?"

Back Forward is a short aracady top-down shooter made for the VimJam 2020. In the game you play through multiple levels, but if you reach the end of one, you need to make your way back with changes made to the stage. To aid you in your passing, you can choose between several items!

(Yeah this description is maybe over hyping this game, oh well)

Make sure to leave some feedback!

Credits:
